A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely dreadful movie.  Beautifully filmed with great fx - in fact possibly the best-looking Star Wars movie to date - but in every other way a pile of rubbish that desecrates the legacy and memory of a beloved franchise.  I thought that the Force Awakens had already killed Star Wars and found it depressing; but this piece of incoherent tripe stomps on the grave and spits on the headstone - and it makes me angry.
